note.p: Estonian. Daughter of Baron Theophile Reinhold William de Rosen (also known as Gottlieb Wilhelm Reinhold von Rosen) of Estonia and his wife, Gertrude Rigby. A second cousin of Joseph Dalton Hooker. Married General Alexander Nikolai Heinrich Georg Anton von Manderstjerna (1817/18–88), Russian army officer and entomologist, in 1860.
Archiv für pathologische Anatomie und Physiologie und für klinische Medecin 115 (1889): 332
Genealogisches Handbuch der baltischen Ritterschaften Estland 1 pt 2: 224–5
